select sum(time) as time,
(select sum(time) as time from habit where id=#{id} and to_char(inputdate, 'month')=to_char(sysdate, 'month') group by to_char(inputdate, 'month')) as mtime,
(select day from (select to_char(inputdate, 'day') as day, count(to_char(inputdate, 'day')) as ct from habit where id=#{id} group by to_char(inputdate, 'day') order by count(to_char(inputdate, 'day')) desc) where rownum=1) as inputdate,
(select to_char(inputdate, 'month') as month from habit where id=#{id} and to_char(inputdate, 'month')=to_char(sysdate, 'month') group by to_char(inputdate, 'month')) as month,
(select count(distinct isbn) as isbn from habit where id=#{id} and to_char(inputdate, 'month')=to_char(sysdate, 'month') group by to_char(inputdate, 'month')) as isbn from habit where id = #{id} group by id
select count(distinct isbn) as isbn, to_char(inputdate, 'month') as month from habit where id=#{id} group by to_char(inputdate, 'month') order by to_char(inputdate, 'month')
select k.genre, sum(k.hits) as hits from (select distinct isbn, id from habit) h, kakaobook k where h.isbn = k.isbn and id = #{id} group by genre
select isbn , authors , title , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') inputdate , thumbnail from shelf where id = #{id} order by title
